creditline: Gift of Tamara and Michael Root
description: flattened cup (a) with loop handle beneath the lip; matte mottled blue slip with painted floating rectangular prism shapes; flat base for cup is narrow oval shape; matching blue boat-shaped saucer (b) with one side higher than the other; interior of both pieces mottled green
medium: Stoneware, hand-built, hand-painted with colored slips
title: Optical Cup and Saucer
